Uses of Interface
edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.IF.Reasoner

  • Packages that use Reasoner 
    Package Description
    edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.IF
    This package and its subpackages provide the "public interface" to SARL.
    edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.common
    Some generic implementations of the Reasoner interface and the interfaces of edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.IF.
    edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.IF
    The internal interface for the "reason" module, which deals with Reasoners --- objects used to prove theorems and simplify symbolic expressions.
    edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.universe.common
    Implementations of SymbolicUniverses.

    • Uses of Reasoner in edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.IF

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Reasoner SymbolicUniverse.reasoner(BooleanExpression context)
      Returns a Reasoner for the given context.

    • Uses of Reasoner in edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.common

      Classes in edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.common that implement Reasoner 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommonReasoner
      An implementation of Reasoner based on a given Simplifier and TheoremProverFactory.
      class  ContextMinimizingReasoner
      A Reasoner based on context minimization.
      class  SimpleReasoner
      Very basic reasoner that does not use any theorem prover, only simplification.
